mapper.select: SELECT r.*, u.`name` AS userName, u.`file` AS userFile FROM `review` AS r JOIN `user` AS u ON r.u_id = u.u_id WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT r.*, u.`name` AS userName, u.`file` AS userFile FROM `review` AS r JOIN `user` AS u ON r.u_id = u.u_id WHERE r.u_id=#{uId} ORDER BY r.`id` DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT r.*, u.`name` AS userName, u.`file` AS userFile FROM `review` AS r JOIN `user` AS u ON r.u_id = u.u_id WHERE free_board_id=#{freeBoardId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN r.review_group IS NULL THEN r.`id` ELSE r.review_group END DESC, r.`id` DESC LIMIT #{start},#{size}
